parameters: Are you sure we can afford this?
Welcome to Soap Land, home of the best and only soap land on the island.
Aren't you... the girl from a moment ago?
You must've mistaken me for someone else, Sir.
A full body service for three.
I'll take you word on it.
I... I can't afford that much!
I told you not to worry. It's on me.
Uhm... I forgot that I don't have any pockets.
You can't afford that much, Dear.
It's okay. I made some extra money.
Don't worry about that right now.
I'll pay you back, my son.
It's okay, Aiyana. It's on me.
I'm so proud of you, Dear.
Ladies, please use the left door...
Rekam'Ybab is getting excited as well.
